DataElement.preferredName: Hepatic Lesion Ablation Therapy Intent Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to intent to removal, separate, detach by surgery, chemical destruction, morbid process, or noxious substance the area of abnormal tissue change in the liver.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to intent to removal, separate, detach by surgery, chemical destruction, morbid process, or noxious substance the area of abnormal tissue change in the liver.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Refers to the liver.:(LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change.:Removal of a part, pathway, or function by surgery, chemical destruction, electrocautery, or radiofrequency. (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to, affecting, or associated with the liver.
A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
Removal, separation, detachment, extirpation, or eradication of a body part, pathway, or function by surgery, chemical destruction, morbid process, or noxious substance.

Property.preferredDefinition: Intent; an anticipated outcome that is intended or that guides your planned actions.

Concepts.definition: An anticipated outcome that is the purpose for actions taken, thus guiding the action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: NSABP CRF:National Surgical Adjuvant Breast and Bowel Project Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
